titlestmt.titleproper: Laurance S. Rockefeller papers, Associates, Thaddeus (Ted) F. Walkowicz papers
A Guide to the Laurance S. Rockefeller papers, Associates, Thaddeus (Ted) F. Walkowicz papers FA1132

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-08-29 00:04:03 -0400.

did.unittitle: Laurance S. Rockefeller papers, Associates, Thaddeus (Ted) F. Walkowicz papers

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United States. Citizens' Advisory Committee on Environmental Quality

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection represents the files of Ted Walkowicz in his capacity as an associate of Laurance S. Rockefeller. The files pertain specifically to the Citizen's Advisory Committee on Environmental Quality chaired by LSR.

The collection contains meeting records of the Committee and Subcommittees as well as associated correspondence, and select reports, studies, printed materials, and background information on energy and the environment.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Walkowicz files were transferred to the RAC by Room 5600 and donated to the Center as a part of the Laurance S. Rockefeller estate in January 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Ted Walkowicz served the Rockefeller family for 21 years, including as an associate of Laurance S. Rockefeller, and often focused on venture capital investments.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php
